scripts.build:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/cooper.scss dist/css/cooper.css
scripts.build:cooper.css: npm run build:sass && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:core: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/core.scss dist/css/cooper-core.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-core.min.css dist/css/cooper-core.css
scripts.build:datatable: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/datatable.scss dist/css/cooper-datatable.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-datatable.min.css dist/css/cooper-datatable.css
scripts.build:dropzone: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/dropzone.scss dist/css/cooper-dropzone.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-dropzone.min.css dist/css/cooper-dropzone.css
scripts.build:flatpicker: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/flatpicker.scss dist/css/cooper-flatpicker.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-flatpicker.min.css dist/css/cooper-flatpicker.css
scripts.build:select2: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/select2.scss dist/css/cooper-select2.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-select2.min.css dist/css/cooper-select2.css
scripts.build:summernote: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/summernote.scss dist/css/cooper-summernote.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-summernote.min.css dist/css/cooper-summernote.css
scripts.build:sweetalert: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/in-build/sweetalert.scss dist/css/cooper-sweetalert.css && cleancss -O2 'all:off;removeDuplicateRules:on' --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cooper-sweetalert.min.css dist/css/cooper-sweetalert.css
scripts.build:login: npm run build:sass && cp ./dist/css/cooper.css /home/jama/development/cooper/src/login/css/cooper.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/login.scss dist/css/c-login.css && cp ./dist/css/c-login.css /home/jama/development/cooper/src/login/css/c-login.css && cp ./node_modules/particles.js/particles.js ./src/login/js/particles.js
scripts.build:cooper:full: npm run build:cooper.css && npm run build:core && npm run build:datatable && npm run build:dropzone && npm run build:flatpicker && npm run build:select2 && npm run build:summernote && npm run build:sweetalert && npm run build:login
